response: You step out of your house after many long months of lockdown. You have it in mind to go on a Super Adventure! To the <keyword>North</keyword> you see some craggy <keyword>mountains</keyword>.
You find yourself surrounded by mountains. To the <keyword>North</keyword> lies a vast malodorous <keyword>swamp</keyword>. To the east, a foreboding <keyword>cave</keyword>.
A foetid, stinking swamp stretches out before you. To the East and West you see only impassable water. To the <keyword>North</keyword> is a thin, rickety <keyword>bridge</keyword>.
You enter the cave and suffer instant regret; from floor to ceiling the <keyword>cave</keyword> is festooned with faeces. You look longingly to the <keyword>West</keyword>.

You cross the rickety bridge and come upon a ramshackle <keyword>hut</keyword>. An aged <keyword>witch</keyword> in rags is standing near the <keyword>hut</keyword>, stirring a large <keyword>cauldron</keyword>. Behind you to the <keyword>South</keyword>, the <keyword>swamp</keyword> bubbles away.
You enter the witch's hut and look about you. You see...
